Package fr.connexe.ui.game.input

package fr.connexe.ui.game.input
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    fr.connexe.ui.game
     
    fr.connexe.ui.game.hud
     
    fr.connexe.ui.game.lobby
     
  • Class
    Description
    ControllerHub
    Receives game controller input, all in one place, using SDL2.
    ControllerHub.State
    All connected controllers with all their currently pressed keys and joystick positions.
    ControllerState
    The state of a controller's buttons and joysticks.
    InputSystemException
    Thrown when something went wrong with SDL2.
    KeyboardHub
    Receives keyboard input from a JavaFX scene, providing the currently pressed keys at any time.
    PlayerInputSource
    Indicates which peripheral the player uses to move in the maze during a game.
    PlayerInputSource.Controller
    The player uses the n-th connected controller to move in the maze.
    PlayerInputSource.KeyboardArrows
    The player uses the keyboard with arrow keys to move in the maze.
    PlayerInputSource.KeyboardZQSD
    The player uses the keyboard with the ZQSD keys (AZERTY) to move in the maze.
